name: launcher
description: A open-source launcher for the OSFR project

scripts.clean: rimraf release/ && rimraf logs/ && rimraf settings.json && rimraf temp-update/
scripts.build: npm run clean && electron-packager . --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=release --overwrite && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.build-zip: npm run build && npm run zip && rimraf release/launcher-win32-x64

author: Lillious
